Member Function Documentation

uint32 PacketCache::calcCRC (  const Packet *  packet  )  [static, private]
 

Calculates the CRC for the supplied packet.

Parameters:
packet Packet to calculate checksum for.
Returns:
The checksum. MAX_UINT32 if too short buffer or so. This means that we cannot cache packet with crc MAX_UINT32.

char *  packetInfo
) 
 

Returns a copy of a cached packet.

The packet should be deleted by the caller (or something called by the caller.).

Parameters:
request Request to check for in the cache.
Returns:
A reply to the request.

uint32 PacketCache::removeOld (   )  [private]
 

Removes the old packets, if there are packet old enough we remove those else we will empty the cache by a certain percantage value.

The percentage will apply to the number of packets in the cache at the current time and not based on the size.
